citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:15pm on
October 15, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by going to the facility, where they spoke with a family
member who informed the inspector that the licensee was not home and not available for several hours. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:15pm on 
October 15, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by going to the facility, where they spoke with a family 
member who informed the inspector that the licensee was not home and not available for several hours. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
